review: Find that available shows need to be purchased. Very limited selection of prime content.
author: Sandra

review: I have a Roku that I  can do more with than the Fire TV stick.  I would recommend looking and comparing the two before making a purchase.
author: Naomi J. Herr

review: I should have ordered a long time ago. I can watch the AMC channel without directv!  The only thing is you can't save it for later. You need to watch as the exact time or you miss It. But at least I save.
author: Karen Gordillo

review: not impressed..I have chrome and buffers all the time fire tv stick adds said buffering would be at a minimum ...well can't tell the difference.gave the chrome to my grand child. will give this to someone else..
author: william aiton

review: LOVE  LOVE LOVE IT!!  You will need a good wireless router.
author: LAURA D. KRUCZEK

review: The fire stick came in on time. The tutorial was automatic and useful.  Love love Amazon!
author: Cecilia Y Larsen

review: Great item no problems connecting to Internet.  Able to watch amazon or Netflix without any problems
author: Amazon Customer

review: Totally dislike the stick,I wish I only paid 19 dollars like some of you,I have Direct TV and the stick is not giving my satellite to be a option and it freezes all the time,totally dissatisfied!
author: Laurie M. Furrer "laurie f"

review: Thought that I would be able to get House of Card for this season (3).  Very disappointed.
author: Patricia Kirkpatrick

review: If you are a prime member and want to access online content quickly, this is the best option I have tried so far. When I think about why I like this over other options, I think it's how it reminds me of old TV that change channels instantly. No lag....
author: David M.
